betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §3Pyrolysis Oven§r is a mid-to-late game oil processing machine that allows easier production pf §6Crystalline Fullerite§r, which is needed in bulk for late-game machines onwards. 

It can process an item with an optional fluid to produce another item and/or fluid. Functionally, it works similar to the §3Combination Oven§r, mostly in bedrock ore processing.
Its main use however is in production of §6Fullerene§r, as it can turn §6Tar§r into §6Fine Soot§r, eliminating the RNG of a §3Smokestack§r.

Operating the pyrolysis oven will consume §e200kHE/s§r.
